title: Account banned
body:
I got my account permanently banned today. 
Reason being, toxic behavior. 
In the game, I tried to ignore my team members cursing at me, but because they all started to throw, I swore at the in the last moment where game was about to end. 
I know it is my mistake for not enduring the insults until the last moment, 
but permanent ban is just too harsh. 
I said three words, 
"Now you are starting to throw, idiots"
"kys"
I didn't even report people who swore at me, but they reported me because I accidentally die.

Please consider unlocking my account,
If not, at least refund me my money I spent on League of Legends. 
I feel victimized by witch hunters because they swore at other team members the whole time and I am the only one got reported and banned. 
 
Thank you.

replies.body:
Unlikely you would of got perm banned for one game of swearing. Shit I have been swearing my ass off at feeders and AFK pricks for years and I'm still here.

Oh and if people don't like swearing that's what the curse filter is for...turn it on.

OCE is far more lenient than NA was back before OCE existed.

Enjoy your ban bro, start a new account at lvl 1.

I had an account banned on NA, I learned my lesson and now I haven't had issues in years.
I just mute trolls rather than bite on their shit-talk.
The first instance of someone bitching, just mute them and get on with the game.
perma banned is for repeated offences kiddo. Hard to buy your story over 1 game.
